Name: 决奕Duel
About the game: This is by a person to develop a fighting without fighting mechanism game. No gorgeous scenes, no sexy characters. Skills do not need to rub, only press down. The damage reduction mechanism and the overlord armor mechanism make the battle more challenging. All kinds of throwing skills, judge skills, invincible skills, displacement skills, make the battle more maneuverable. Every character has a big skill, But it starts with a skill cooldown. You can play 1v1 against your friends. Or one person playing PVE. Of course, you can also enter practice mode to familiarize yourself with the operation or tricks! If you're confused about a skill, check out the in-game skill description. It's just a simple description, but it may help you. There are five roles in the current version.
